## Why

You should consider hiring us if:

- You don’t know how to consistently and quickly improve your LLM products.
- Your LLMs are too expensive or slow.
- You feel blind re: how good/reliable your LLMs are.
- You are overwhelmed by tools/frameworks.

## Expertise

Our expertise includes:

1. Building domain-specific evaluation systems
2. Optimizing RAG
3. Fine-tuning
4. Creating dev tools and infrastructure to help you iterate quickly on LLMs.
5. LLM vendor evaluation and selection

## Solutions

We offer [two tiers of services](services.qmd). Contact us at `consulting@parlance-labs.com` to get started.
